articles.title: Inflation fears are boosting gold and the US dollar - CNN
articles.description: The stock market is booming, and despite uncertainty about the economy, Wall Street is confident it can keep pressing ahead. But as inflation surges, there's also an undercurrent of anxiety about what the future holds.
